title: Judge temporarily blocks Pentagon action against Mark Kelly over illegal orders video
description: Kelly, an Arizona Democrat, sued Hegseth after the Defense Secretary moved to formally censure him for participating in a video where he  told service members they can refuse illegal orders.
content: Kelly, an Arizona Democrat, sued Hegseth after the Defense Secretary moved to formally censure him for participating in a video where he  told service members they can refuse illegal orders.
